contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|throw|throwing|thrown|throws}} '''Throwing''' usually refers to: *launching a [[projectile]], especially by hand It can also refer to: ==Music== *[[Throw (band)]], a punk band from the Philippines formed by Al Dimalanta (formerly of Dead Ends). ==Sports== *[[Throw (grappling)]], a martial arts and grappling technique that involves off-balancing or lifting an opponent *[[Throwing (cricket)]], bowling a delivery in cricket with an elbow flexion degree higher than that set by the ICC *[[Knife throwing]], the art of throwing a knife at a target *[[Disc golf]], golf-like sport played by throwing flying discs. *Throwing events are: **[[Discus throw]] **[[Hammer throw]] **[[Javelin throw]] **[[Shot put]] **[[Club throw]] *[[Match fixing]], or throwing a game, meaning to intentionally lose ==Other== * [[Mardi gras throws]], or throws, are small gifts or trinkets passed out or thrown from New Orleans Mardi Gras parades to spectators lining the streets * Another name for [[English knitting]], a style of knitting * The process of [[Pottery#Methods of shaping|making ceramic ware]] on the potter's wheel * A computer programming term for raising an exception in [[Exception handling#Exception support in programming languages|exception handling]] * [[Throw (projector)]], the distance of movie projector to the screen * Throw, part of an electrical [[switch]] (changeover switch) * The distance that a jet of fluid travels, such as in diffusers for [[HVAC|room air distribution]] * The range of motion of a [[joystick]]'s shaft * The distance between gears as experienced by the driver of a [[manual transmission]] * Throw, in geology, the [[vertical displacement]] of rock strata at a fault * Throw, the act of rolling [[dice]] * Throw, a light [[coverlet (disambiguation)|coverlet]] used on a bed, sofa, or other furniture * Throw, a women's [[scarf]] or light wrap * An injury such as a [[pulled muscle]] or [[sprain]] * Throw a game in [[DotA]] * Throw a game in [[League of Legends]] == See also == *[[Trow (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
